"...Hello.": "...You saw that annoying broadcast, right? Looks like they're planning some kind of battle competition."
"...That's the public face of it, but I think there's something else behind that."
"...Battles will become tougher in the future, so this event looks like it's about selecting people to fight them."
"...To take on enemies as powerful as that Dark Falz before, we need to match their power."
"...But that Huey is organizing it, so maybe I'm overthinking it."
"...Although, a test of our abilities is a little intriguing. They've never done anything like this before."
